tools.evaluation.score

Module Contents

Functions

specific_scores(→ tuple)

Calculate evaluation scores.
tools.evaluation.score.specific_scores(y: numpy.array, y_pred: numpy.array, target: str) → tuple[source]

Calculate evaluation scores. :param y: True value :param y_pred: Prediction :param target: Specific type :return: (accuracy, precision, recall, F1-score, cohen-kappa)

Usage: >>> specific_scores([“A”, “B”, “C”, “A”, “B”], [“A”, “B”, “C”, “B”, “A”], “A”) # (0.2, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.04761904761904763) >>> specific_scores([“A”, “B”, “C”, “A”, “B”], [“B”, “B”, “C”, “B”, “A”], “A”) (0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0.08695652173913043)
